sentences.en: Goebbels and his assistants avidly studied the foreign press to exploit weak spots in their propaganda.
sentences.cn: 戈培尔和他的助手们废寝忘食地研究外国报刊,以便利用它们宣传中的弱点.

sentences.en: Having spent a lifetime avidly courting publicity, Paul has suddenly become secretive.
sentences.cn: 保罗一生都在想方设法出风头，现在却突然行事低调了。

sentences.en: He could imagine poor old Fred Damdy reading that item avidly.
sentences.cn: 他想象着可怜的老弗雷德·道迪可能正贪婪地阅读着这则消息.

sentences.en: Her melancholy eyes avidly scanned his smiling face.
sentences.cn: 她说话时两只忧郁的眼睛呆呆地望着他的带笑的脸.

sentences.en: Overwhelmed with pity, Jui - chueh looked avidly at Mei's face, while tightly squeezing her hand.
sentences.cn: 瑞珏 激动得厉害,一种强烈的爱怜的感情抓住了她, 她贪婪地望着梅的脸, 同时紧紧地捏住梅的手.

sentences.en: She chewed up the nut and swallowed it avidly.
sentences.cn: 她充分咀嚼了干果,贪婪地把它吞了下去.

sentences.en: She read avidly from an early age — books, magazines, anything.
sentences.cn: 她从小就酷爱阅读——书籍 、 杂志, 无不涉猎.

sentences.en: Suitable minerals containing these two elements are still avidly sought.
sentences.cn: 目前还在竭力寻找含有这两种元素的适用材料.

sentences.en: Thank you for a most entertaining magazine, which I read avidly each month.
sentences.cn: 感谢你们把杂志编得如此有趣，我每个月都如痴如醉地阅读。

sentences.en: The trail , the frustration, claimed him again and he searched the ground avidly.
sentences.cn: 痕迹和挫折促使他继续前进.

sentences.en: Thousands avidly watched their town or company try to defeat their rivals.
sentences.cn: 数千人热情地观看他们的城镇或公司奋击对手的比赛.
